game.name: Sinking Eternity
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Sinking Eternity is a single-player underwater exploration RPG. Survive extreme depths, hide from dangerous sea creatures, and uncover the secrets of a civilization lost for millennia.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sinking Eternity is a single-player underwater exploration RPG. Survive extreme depths, hide from dangerous sea creatures, and uncover the secrets of a civilization lost for millennia.
